content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All employees, officers and Board members are expected to know and follow \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s Code of Ethical Conduct\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". EPAM also expects all contractors, suppliers and other business partners to follow this Code when working for us or with us. Failure to follow the Code can result in disciplinary action up to termination of employment (employees) or termination of the relationship (non-employees). Disciplinary action may also be taken against managers or officers who condone, permit or fail to take appropriate preventive, corrective or other action against illegal, unethical or other conduct that may violate the Code. All employees and contractors must cooperate with EPAM investigations to the fullest extent permitted by law, whether conducted by internal personnel, or by external persons at the direction of the company. If you become aware of conduct that you think violates EPAM’s Code or that may be harmful to EPAM, you should let EPAM know.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A copy of EPAM’s Code of Ethical Conduct, as may be modified from time to time, appears on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s public website\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/ethics.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s Infoportal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
